questValues.8: Head through the Cathedral of the Deep to the bedrock area at the back (-1671 8 354)
questValues.10: Speak to Spoilers
questValues.11: Return to the door near Professor Marl (-1077 83 -353). Talk to them.
questValues.12: Cutscene score, speak to Professor Marl
questValues.13: Let Marl convince you to go through the door. Marl can get you back through it at a later score
questValues.14: Speak to Marl in the area past the door
questValues.15: Cutscene score from talking to Marl
questValues.20: Open the chest past the door at (-1143 23 -367)
questValues.21: Open the chest past the door

questValues.1: Drink the potion Nai gave you
questValues.1: 1 or 2: Head to Velara (494 71 128). Once there head through the path unlocked during Roots of the Plague (936 195 785). Then to the path used during Crystal Connection (986 181 752).
questValues.2: Speak to Xolotl (1000 172 754) and dream. Make your way through the water maze area then go down the hole in the big glowstone crystal thing(-2408 175 429). Speak to Mictlan (-2377 129 433) and teleport. Attempt to open the chest at -2398 110 430). Beat the boss inside (Go in circles around it)
questValues.3: Bring the item you got after beating the boss back to Nai. If you lost it Xolotl has more.

questValues.2: Defeat 5 Star Spitters (Spawner at -1500 46 368). At the moment your score will not be updated after you beat 5, you just have to keep track on your own and realize that you need to go back to Erwen.
questValues.4: Defeat 5 Weeping Barkings (Spawner at 1366 152 159). At the moment your score will not be updated after you beat 5, you just have to keep track on your own and realize that you need to go back to Erwen.
questValues.6: Defeat 3 Hate Knights (PoI at 216, 87, 142). At the moment your score will not be updated after you beat 3, you just have to keep track on your own and realize that you need to go back to Erwen.
questValues.7: Continue talking to Erwen
questValues.8: Continue talking to Erwen
questValues.9: Enter the lair of the Questing Beast. Beat it (-752 124 -52)
questValues.10: Talk to Erwen

questArrayList.questDescription: Quest Start: Cinevra (-766 132 64) or Mara (-756 132 73) (depending on Crystal Connection progress)

questValues.1: Speak to Vinny, go downstairs, figure out the puzzle. Enter 504 into the elevator. Get the crystal from the chest and bring it to Cinevra
Speak to the Head Alchemist in Sierhaven (-784 117 -50)
questValues.2: Find the button to the puzzle room in Toxin Lab (-1192 36 126), solve the puzzle, get the Thermal Reagent out of the chest (-1181 4 128). Return to Suri.

Press the button at 490 188 -381, after being teleported move forward into the ice wall. After that teleports you, solve the puzzle. If they leave the area for scores 3 through X repeat the first two steps of this score
questValues.5: Speak to R’Tsiv (433 167 -648), if a player needs to leave they can left click the fire at (470 169 -620)
questValues.6: Get wheat at (507 166 -676). Put wheat in hopper at (516 180 -658), collect ground flour at (513 170 -658), fish from the dock at around (476 164 -665) for 5 Figment of Dreaming. Then trade the ground flower and 5 Figment of Dreaming at the barrel at (433 171 -620). Take the resulting Akkotl back to R’Tsiv.
questValues.7: Get a book from the barrel at (493 72 -185) under the Tiny Jungle Ruins
questValues.8: Get a book from the barrel at (632 57 -108) under the Crossroad Ruins.
questValues.9: Head to the Inner Sanctum and speak to Kathryn at (1052 73 296)
questValues.10: Head to the Inner Sanctum and speak to Kathryn at (1052 73 296)

questValues.4: Bring Colder an Essence of Winter, either from an amplified PoI or the event.
questValues.5: Speak to Colder and view cutscene.
questValues.6: Speak to Colder in his lab (-330 172 -567) (accessed by talking to him in Nyr)
questValues.7: Go into boss instance, defeat the boss
questValues.8: Speak to Colder in his lab
questValues.10: Speak to Selholly Sprignos

questValues.4: Speak to Taymian upstairs in Apartment 230
questValues.5: Speak to Taymian upstairs in Apartment 230
questValues.ATP: Solve the parkour and get to the exit. This gives the player the tag FinishedAdventureTime (NOTE: no scoreboard value association)
questValues.SIS Head 1: Talk to the Invader of the Forest (-2715 159 -91). You will get the tag Quest59Head1 unless it is the last of the four. (NOTE: no scoreboard value association)
questValues.SIS Head 2: Talk to the Serpensia Knot (-2730 158 -43). You will get the tag Quest59Head2 unless it is the last of the four. (NOTE: no scoreboard value association)
questValues.SIS Head 3: Talk to the Serpensia Venomlord (-2632 156 -29). You will get the tag Quest59Head3 unless it is the last of the four. (NOTE: no scoreboard value association)
questValues.SIS Head 4: Talk to the Serpensia Warrior (-2648 157 -76). You will get the tag Quest59Head4 unless it is the last of the four. (NOTE: no scoreboard value association)
questValues.SIS with 4 heads: The Quest59Head tags are removed and you are given Quest59Sewer. Talk to the sewer grate (-2660 157 -66) (NOTE: no scoreboard value association)
questValues.SIS Sewers: Find Herring and speak to Taymian (-2693 108 -63). This gives the player the tag FinishedStudyInScarlet (NOTE: no scoreboard value association)
questValues.5: 5 - Pick Crewvengers Crewsemble: Crewvengers Crewsemble Path Starts. You must do the other two before this one
questValues.CC: Find your crewmate and speak to Taymian (-2682 15 -81). This gives the player the tag FinishedCrewvengersCrewsemble (NOTE: no scoreboard value association)
questValues.5: 5 with 3 tags: Speak to Taymian upstairs in Apartment 230
questValues.6: Speak to Taymian upstairs in Apartment 230
questValues.7: Speak to Taymian upstairs in Apartment 230
questValues.8: Speak to Taymian upstairs in Apartment 230

questValues.10: Cutscene ending boat instance, if they stay at this they bugged out somehow. Either set to 9 or 11.

questValues.13: Quest Complete
